definitions: Raises (a child or animal) to maturity.
Cares for and educates (a child) until maturity.
(Of a horse or other animal) raises itself up on its hind legs.
Is situated at the back of something.
examples: She rears her children with great care.
The mare rears at the sudden noise.
The company rears new buildings downtown.
The mountain rears its head above the clouds.
